actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-55.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-55) Declares that the expenses, not to exceed $900,000, of certain investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries shall be paid out of the contingent fund of the House.

titles.title: Resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
